users.description: Bryan Brown was born on June 23, 1947 in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia as Bryan Neathaway Brown
Imposing, barrel-chested and now silver-haired Brian Dennehy is a prolific US actor

projects.title: F/X3 - Their effects had _better_ be special!
projects.description: Outgunned by the mob, outmanned by the cops..... their effects had _better_ be special!
projects.pitch: F/X man Rollie Tyler (Bryan Brown) is now a toy maker. Mike Brandon (Tom Mason), the ex-husband of Rolly's girlfriend Kim(Rachel Ticotin), is a cop. He asks Rollie to help catch a killer. The operation goes well until some unknown man kills both the killer and Mike.
